snippet: State Street has agreed to pay $550 million for Goldman Sachs's hedge fund administration unit, a deal that will make State Street the biggest servicer of hedge funds in the world.
abstract: State Street has agreed to pay $550 million for Goldman Sachs's hedge fund administration unit, a deal that will make State Street the biggest servicer of hedge funds in the world.

headline.main: State Street to Buy Goldman's Hedge Fund Administration Unit
headline.print_headline: State Street Agrees to Buy A Servicer Unit Of Goldman
